title: Document Search
subtitle: Search within document content
description: Search across all uploaded documents using OCR-extracted text

search.minCharacters: Enter at least 2 characters to search
search.noResults: No documents found matching your search

errors.unsupportedType: This file type is not supported for OCR
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large for OCR processing
errors.processingFailed: OCR processing failed. Please try again.
errors.noTextFound: No text could be extracted from this document

tooltips.ocrConfidence: Confidence score indicates how accurate the text extraction is (0-100%)
tooltips.searchLanguage: Filter results by the language of extracted text
tooltips.relevanceScore: Higher scores indicate better matches for your search query

empty.title: No Documents Indexed
empty.description: Upload documents to enable content search. Supported formats: PDF, PNG, JPEG, TIFF.

processing.title: Documents Being Processed
processing.description: {{count}} document is currently being processed for text extraction
processing.description_plural: {{count}} documents are currently being processed for text extraction
